Here is the list of zodiac signs and their scores based on various astrological sources:
1. Aries - 8/10 - Fiery and adventurous, Aries are natural-born leaders who thrive in fast-paced environments.
2. Taurus - 7/10 - Reliable and practical, Tauruses value stability and security, making them steady and persistent workers.
3. Gemini - 9/10 - Quick-witted and curious, Geminis are communicative and adaptable, exceling at learning new skills.
4. Cancer - 6/10 - Emotionally intelligent and nurturing, Cancers prioritize relationships and home life, sometimes struggling with assertiveness.
5. Leo - 8/10 - Confident and charismatic, Leos shine bright as natural performers who crave attention and admiration.
6. Virgo - 7/10 - Analytical and meticulous, Virgos excel at detailed work and problem-solving, often sacrificing spontaneity for perfection.
7. Libra - 9/10 - Diplomatic and social, Librans value harmony and balance in all aspects of life, making them excellent mediators and partners.
8. Scorpio - 8/10 - Passionate and intense, Scorpions are naturally intuitive and perceptive, often seeing through others' masks.
9. Sagittarius - 9/10 - Adventurous and freedom-loving, Sagittarians seek expansion and exploration, often taking bold risks to achieve their goals.
10. Capricorn - 7/10 - Ambitious and disciplined, Capricorns are driven by a desire for success and recognition, sometimes at the cost of personal happiness.
11. Aquarius - 8/10 - Humanitarian and unconventional, Aquarians value individuality and independence, often working towards greater good.
12. Pisces - 6/10 - Empathetic and imaginative, Pisces are naturally artistic and compassionate, struggling with boundaries and self-preservation.
Note: These scores are generalizations based on various astrological sources and should not be taken as absolute or scientifically proven.
